title: Instructional Design Research for Sustainable Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level expertise in the field (science) and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Blended learning model for professional (medical/legal/technical) adult learners to reduce carbon emissions and enhance educational effectiveness, combining twice-weekly in-person classes with online learning

learning_goals: Learners explain six principles of sustainable blended learning design and apply them to actual educational scenarios.
Learners establish and execute self-directed learning plans using online learning technologies.
Learners analyze the educational effects and environmental impacts of limiting in-person class attendance to twice weekly.

resources: Collaboration tools (real-time video conferencing, document-sharing platforms)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
